abstract: Deutsche Telekom could move quickly to seal a new alliance with another American telecommunications operator for T-Mobile USA following the collapse of its planned sale to AT&T, analysts said.
snippet: Deutsche Telekom could move quickly to seal a new alliance with another American telecommunications operator for T-Mobile USA following the collapse of its planned sale to AT&T, analysts said.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN — Deutsche Telekom could move quickly to seal a new alliance with another American telecommunications operator for its T-Mobile USA subsidiary following the collapse of its planned sale to AT&T, analysts said on Tuesday.

headline.main: As Deutsche Telekom Ponders Options, a New Deal Is Expected
